definition: 100 ml/one-tenth of a peck/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗
to close/to join/to fit/to be equal to/whole/together/round (in battle)/conjunction (astronomy)/1st note of pentatonic scale/old variant of 盒[he2]

sentences.english: First, I cut an access hole in the Bridge Deck and glued the Wheelhouse to it.
sentences.chinese: 首先，我削減一進入洞，在橋面和膠合板舵手給它。

sentences.english: They could do that using plywood and a seat out of an existing airplane.
sentences.chinese: 他們可能用膠合板和其它現有飛機的座椅進行試驗。

sentences.english: This instrument can be used for centering during edging and cement, and testing centering error of lenses.
sentences.chinese: 該儀器可用於磨邊或膠合定中心和檢驗透鏡中心誤差。

sentences.english: Glue the horn strips to core.
sentences.chinese: 膠合墊鐵小條挖出果核。

sentences.english: On the assertion of producer, gluing they are resistant to abrasion and action of water.
sentences.chinese: 就斷言生產者，膠合他們是抗磨損和行動的水。

sentences.english: The inside walls were all finished with lauan plywood and painted white partly.
sentences.chinese: 內牆都採用柳桉木膠合板，部分牆體被刷成了白色。

sentences.english: Yet underneath the tough veneer lies a strong current of social optimism.
sentences.chinese: 在堅硬的膠合板下面躺着一個龐大的社會樂觀性。

sentences.english: No tablet coatings, diluents, binders, granulators, disintegrators or colors.
sentences.chinese: 無片劑外層，稀釋劑，膠合物，成粒子和分解素。

sentences.english: When you have finished weaving the mat, glue the ends of the strips on the first paper.
sentences.chinese: 當您完成編織蓆子時，膠合小條的末端在第一張紙的。
樺木膠合板箱體，黑色噴漆。

sentences.english: Glue them together and wrap with plastic wrap, clamp tightly and let dry.
sentences.chinese: 一起膠合他們和套與塑料套，緊緊夾緊並且讓乾燥。

sentences.english: We are a company that produces plywood and have right of self-run export…
sentences.chinese: 我公司是一家擁有自營出口權的生產膠合板的企業。

sentences.english: A second phase generates the glue code and the system configuration code.
sentences.chinese: 第二個階段是生成膠合代碼以及系統配置代碼。

sentences.english: Poplar(Populus deltoides) veneers were used to make plywood for concrete forms.
sentences.chinese: 採用浸膠玻璃纖維布強化方法制造楊木膠合板模板。
